projects.name: E-rik
projects.description: Online cab booking system for LPU: Constructed a App for ease of availability of Cab to users (Book/Ride). Developed features like Book online, Availability of seat, Direct Payment, Route Selection, settings, login and signup. Utilized Firebase to handle backend requests for application, and used dart to respond back.

projects.name: Music Player
projects.description: Offline Audio Player / Music library: Built a Website that include Search Music option, Library, Customized Playlists, Sorting of Library. Used XML to make the webpages user friendly. Explored more about Kotlin & XML for dipper knowledge.

projects.name: E-Farm
projects.description: Ecommerce site and disease detection: Built a Web application to manage Farming, Crop-orders and Identify Crop Disease. Used MySQL to manage the data of all transactions, keeping bill receipts/pdfs. Explored Python Pillow library and implemented user friendly UI.

experiences.description: CipherSchool's Summer Training in Programming with C++ is designed to equip participants with comprehensive skills in one of the most powerful and widely used programming languages.

Developed a webapplication for managing Services for the startup called Sanjivan Solar pvt. ltd. This platform provides Online showcase of Solars, offers booking and purchasing online, and also enables users to become agents and offer Discounts. The application is made available for Android and Web platforms.

full_output.name: Anand Mandkikar
